General.Name: Datang HuaYin Electric Power Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: DaTang HuaYin Electric Power CO.,LTD engages in the production of power in Hunan province and other regions in China. The company engages in thermal power generation business, as well as operates water electricity, wind power, and solar energy business. It sells its power products to power grid companies, electricity sales companies, and power grid trading center. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Changsha, China.
